column4: Hello guys. I`m using Ubuntu 7.10 (fresh re-install just the other day) on a Dell notebook and I`m having some trouble fixing a a bug that prevent the backlight to turn off when the LID is closed. On previous install I know that all I had to do is comment out line 9 in /etc/acpi/lid.sh . But now, the same fix is not working. Each time I close the LID, the backlight stays on, and I`m afraid of not burning out my laps. Is there any solution to this bug?  (I did
some *extensive* searching on ubuntuforums, but came up with nothing really useful).
sum that up
When I close the LID of my notebook, the back light doesn`t turn off.
you mean the screen?
